/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by towering buildings and skyscrapers, their glass and steel facades reflecting the bright sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the scene. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A few cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape.
